Best regards,

Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex

Your Account will soon be suspended
Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
"doe@mail.uni.ex"

https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex


<="" account="">

Sincerely
mail.uni.ex support team.

thank You for reporting. It is very appreciated.

Team 2

description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: jane.taylor@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? When I visited our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/ an hour ago, I could see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation. Now I suddenly cannot access the website at all.
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Dear Mrs./Ms. Taylor,

the project is under a phishing attack. We have blocked access to the website until the issue is resolved.

Thank you for understanding

Best IT security s.r.o.

Oh no, our web needs to stay online as long as possible!

Regards,

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Dear Jane,

we are working on bringing the web back up.

Team 2

description: Email address to university cloud provider

emails.content:
Hello,

our website on IP address 198.51.100.40 is under a phishing attack. We have blocked traffic from the address for now. Could you look into that?

Team 2

Hello,

we just power off a virtual machine hosting this website.

Best,
Cloud provider

Hi,

thanks for such quick action. Could you provide the logs of traffic on the VM?

Team 2

Sorry, we don't have any logs. Please contact admin of a VM hosting this web, harris@mail.uni.ex.

Best,
Cloud provider
